description: Kasumi Aika is the vice president of the http://anidb.net/ch16568 [Student Council]. Like many other http://anidb.net/ch16459 [Hakuo Academy] students, she comes from a rich family. While she may be seen as a sweet, kind, and gentle girl to most people, secretly she is also very manipulative and takes advantage of any situation she sees, a fact only http://anidb.net/ch530 [Hinagiku] and http://anidb.net/ch10198 [Chiharu] are aware of.
name: Kasumi Aika
